item.title: By: Matt & Judith
item.dc:creator: Matt & Judith
item.description: <p>Hi to all hope your well, hope you don't mind matthew Matt & I are watching the England v Australia match on sky, as the cricket is now cancelled tomorrow. Quick note for mum & dad all is fine here thanks, getting better each day should be fine well before you get back. co-er coded messages or what! Matt is sitting drinking beer and wishes he was with you too in that lovely sunshine, so do I hope to hear more soon. By the way if mum & dad want to email matt & I direct our email is "judithandmatt@yahoo.co.uk" and we'll reply asap. and to any other friend or family member. Keep in touch all our love Judith & Matt</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi to all hope your well, hope you don’t mind matthew Matt & I are watching the England v Australia match on sky, as the cricket is now cancelled tomorrow. Quick note for mum & dad all is fine here thanks, getting better each day should be fine well before you get back. co-er coded messages or what! Matt is sitting drinking beer and wishes he was with you too in that lovely sunshine, so do I hope to hear more soon. By the way if mum & dad want to email matt & I direct our email is “judithandmatt@yahoo.co.uk” and we’ll reply asap. and to any other friend or family member. Keep in touch all our love Judith & Matt

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>The internet is a great way to talk to you all - lovely to hear from Judith & Matt Hope things are going well -any news? Matthew, thanks for putting up the picture and hope you are really enjoying the holiday - you won't want to go back to work!! We went to the wine areas yesterday and leave Cape Town today to start our jouney up through the country. I will probably not be on email for a few days. Weather in the 90s, and having a super time......</p>
item.content:encoded: The internet is a great way to talk to you all – lovely to hear from Judith & Matt Hope things are going well -any news? Matthew, thanks for putting up the picture and hope you are really enjoying the holiday – you won’t want to go back to work!! We went to the wine areas yesterday and leave Cape Town today to start our jouney up through the country. I will probably not be on email for a few days. Weather in the 90s, and having a super time……

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>It's great to be able to keep in touch with you all, matthew your photos are great! it looks like your having fun and enjoying your hols. Love the photo mum & dad, just to let you know it's cold & wet here, no change !! and all is going well. Matt and I are watching the cricket together on Thursday and looking forward to the latest news from you all. Hope your enjoying your trip mum & dad and take care keep in touch. Matthew I'm so jelous wish I was there well anywhere that's warmer than Ipswich. love to all Judith and Matt</p>
item.content:encoded: It’s great to be able to keep in touch with you all, matthew your photos are great! it looks like your having fun and enjoying your hols. Love the photo mum & dad, just to let you know it’s cold & wet here, no change !! and all is going well. Matt and I are watching the cricket together on Thursday and looking forward to the latest news from you all. Hope your enjoying your trip mum & dad and take care keep in touch. Matthew I’m so jelous wish I was there well anywhere that’s warmer than Ipswich. love to all Judith and Matt
